findings.title: Skill name does not follow agent skills naming rules
findings.description: Skill name 'Job Search MCP' is invalid. Agent skills require lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only, with a maximum length of 64 characters.

findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: claude_desktop_config.json
findings.snippet: Add the following to your Claude Desktop config file (`~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json` on macOS):
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: AUTONOMY ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects unbounded autonomy patterns that could lead to runaway behavior: Ignore Error
findings.snippet: **Why:** Rate limits, network issues, and invalid parameters require appropriate handling.
findings.remediation: Review and remove autonomy abuse pattern

findings.title: SKILL DISCOVERY ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects manipulation of skill discovery to increase unwanted activation: Primary Tool
findings.remediation: Review and remove skill discovery abuse pattern
